comment.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yZgYkJfNFZo](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.youtube.com%2Fwatch%3Fv%3DyZgYkJfNFZo) ### Comment > Happens on youtube on all videos. about 95% of the time when a video is clicked. safari autoplay settings are turned off for youtube. when the video is clicked the ad does not play and looks like as described on the screenshot. you cannot force the ad to play and the only way to get to the video is to keep refreshing until you get to it which is usually 1-4 refreshes. This started happening when upgraded to ventura. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/ftSXj7x.jpg)
### System configuration Information | value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Safari v1.11.8 Browser: | Safari Filters: | Ad Blocking:
AdGuard Base,
EasyList

Privacy:
AdGuard Tracking Protection

Annoyances:
AdGuard Annoyances,
Adblock Warning Removal List Other extensions used: | none
